name: retile
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cover a wall, floor, or roof with new tiles (= thin, usually square or rectangular pieces of baked clay, plastic, etc.): Ann went into the house, where Andrew had been retiling the bathroom. We had our roof re-tiled two years ago.
More examplesFewer examplesShe has retiled the bathroom and kitchen floors, repaired the guttering, and painted the house.Old windows have been replaced and the roof has been retiled.She has had her pool retiled in blue mosaic.The upstairs bathroom will have to be re-tiled at some point.
